oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lawyers; Judicial proceedings
Darrow, Clarence, 1857-1938; Evolution and anti-evolution; Evolution (Biology) - Study and teaching - Law and legislation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Clarence Darrow in the midst of the Scopes trial.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: TSLA Staff
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Clarence Darrow was an American lawyer and prominent member of the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU). He defended John T. Scopes in the famed Scopes "Monkey" Trial.
